resources.string:
Caution!

Never eat mushrooms that have been identified with this app.

The consumption of mushrooms always happens at your own risk.

The app can not replace the advice of an experienced professional. It provides only basic knowledge to simplify the mushroom identification. The data is based on the actual state of knowledge and professional experience. However we can not give any guarentee for the correctness of the edibility-values.

Continue if you agree with these conditions.
